#!/usr/bin/python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# 
# Author: Gabriele Girelli
# Email: gigi.ga90@gmail.com
# Version: 0.0.1
# Description: Oligopool-design Route manager
# 
# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------



# DEPENDENCIES =================================================================

import bottle as bot
import json

from .. import routes

from .session import Session as OPS

# CLASSES ======================================================================


[docs]class Routes(routes.Routes):
	'''Routes class.'''

	# Empty routes dictionary
	data = {}

	def __init__(self):
		'''
		Create new routes here using the add_route method.
		'''

		# Set default Routes
		super(Routes, self).__init__()

		# Static files ---------------------------------------------------------

		route = '/jsm/<path:re:.*>'
		self.add_route('node_module', 'route', route)

		# Pages ----------------------------------------------------------------

		# Forms ----------------------------------------------------------------

		# Errors ---------------------------------------------------------------

		# App ------------------------------------------------------------------
		
		self.add_route('get_app', 'route', '/app/<path>')
		self.add_route('get_tpl', 'route', '/tpl/<path>')

		self.add_route('session_action', 'post', '/s/a/<action>/<sessionId:re:.*>')
		self.add_route('session_action', 'view', 'session_action.tpl')

		return

	# Static files -------------------------------------------------------------


[docs]	def node_module(routes, self, path):
		'''Node module content.

		Args:
			routes (Route): sections.Route instance.
			self (App): sections.App instance.
			path (string): filepath.
		'''
		return(bot.static_file(path, self.local_path + '/js/node_modules/'))


	# Pages --------------------------------------------------------------------


[docs]	def home(routes, self):
		'''Home-page.

		Args:
			routes (Route): sections.Route instance.
			self (App): sections.App instance.
		'''

		# Template dictionary
		d = self.vd

		# Page title and description
		d['title'] = self.tprefix + 'Home'

		# Local stylesheets
		d['custom_stylesheets'] = ['home.css']

		# Root stylesheets
		d['custom_root_stylesheets'] = []
		
		return(d)


	# Form reception -----------------------------------------------------------

	# Error --------------------------------------------------------------------
	
	# App ----------------------------------------------------------------------


[docs]	def get_app(routes, self, path):
		'''Retreive Angular2 App material.

		Args:
			routes (Route): sections.Route instance.
			self (App): sections.App instance.
			path (String): file path.
		'''
		return(bot.static_file(path, self.local_path + '/js/app/'))



[docs]	def get_tpl(routes, self, path):
		'''Retreive .

		Args:
			routes (Route): sections.Route instance.
			self (App): sections.App instance.
			path (String): file path.
		'''
		fpath = path + '.tpl.html'
		return(bot.static_file(fpath, self.local_path + '/js/app/template/'))



[docs]	def session_action(routes, self, action, sessionId):
		'''Session action manager.'''

		# Session directory
		sdir = self.local_path + '/sessions/'


		# Allowed actions
		allowed_actions = {
			'create'	: None,		# Session creation function
			'load'		: None,		# Session loading function
			'add_pool'	: lambda s : s.add_empty_pool(),
			'save_pool_settings' : lambda s, _id, settings: s.set_pool_settings(_id, settings)
		}

		# Check provided session ID
		if 0 == len(sessionId):
			sessionId = None

		# Instantiate session (create or load)
		session = OPS(sdir, sessionId)

		# If the instantiation failed or the requested action does not exist
		if type(None) == type(session) or not action in allowed_actions.keys():
			# Trigger error 500
			return(routes.error500(self, []))

		# Select action function
		action = allowed_actions[action]
		if not type(None) == type(action):
			# Build action function parameter
			kwargs = { 's' : session }
			kwargs.update(json.loads(bot.request.body.read().decode('utf-8')))

			# Perform action function
			action(**kwargs)

		# Dump after action
		session.dump()

		# Close
		return(session.to_json(stringify = True))


# END ==========================================================================
